src: She was diagnosed with a mental disorder.
ref: Aligunduliwa kuwa na unyogovu wa akili.

mt: Ujuzi wake ulikuwa sawa na ule wake.

src: He is about to die in an explosion.
mt: Anafanya kazi kwa kufa katika kupulika.

src: The balloon went into the air.

mt: Kiumbe alikufa kwa kupindua mwenye kushinda.

src: I put the container in the hot stove.
The driver walked while the red light was on.
mt: Kabla hajamaliza, mwenyeji alikuwa anamaliza kwa mwelekeo wa kibichi.
ref: Dereva alitembea wakati taa nyekundu inawaka.

src: The keeper of the pool grew up there.
mt: Kamanda wa barabara ya maji alizaliwa huko.

ref: Kiwango cha mapigo ya moyo kiliongezeka.

src: The families waved to their neighbors from their garden.
mt: Wazazi wakawia wenzao kutoka kwa boma lao.
ref: Familia walipunga mikono kwa jirani zao kutoka bustanini kwao.

src: The swimmer floated in the pool.

ref: Kwa bahati mbaya nilikata jino langu.
Nyuzi zake za viatu ilikuwa hazijafungwa.

src: I put it in the refrigerator.
The crew was confronted by pirates.
mt: Kundi linaloongoza lilipigwa na wapiga vita.

src: My friend stood up for me.
ref: Rafiki yangu alisimama kwa ajili yangu.

src: I changed gears on the bike.

ref: Baba yake alimgusa paji la uso.

src: I tossed them under the toilet bowl.
ref: Nilizitupa chini ya bakuli la choo.

mt: Kutoka kwa wewe, wewe kila wakati unakataa.

src: He threw the chair into the room.
He did not see the towels.
They encouraged their children to play outside.

mt: Kipande cha kizungu kiliwa na maganda.

src: I heard a conversation in the hall.

mt: Uwanja wa ndege ulikuwa umekaa kama umekaa.

src: He had died with his wife.
Make a bet with his friend.
mt: Kuwa na mshartaki na rafiki yake.
